page.title: 08ASHDON,ORGANISATIONS,CLUBS.
page.content:
ties with the village in that they have moved away or their parents or family live in Ashdon.The team is a complete mix of people representing all walks of life,this reflects the "village spirit"that is present in Ashdon.Results are not taken too seriously,it is hoped to win about 50% of the matches,the main aim of the members is to play "friendly"cricket with interesting and "friendly" opposition.
{ASHDON PLAYGROUP} Ashdon Playgroup was formed in November 1972 and caters for young children between the ages of 3 and 5 years.It is held on Tuesday,Wednesday, and Thursday mornings and there are 20 children on roll.
